metadata.title: Marius Bălaj
metadata.description: UI engineer turned founder. Built. Scaled. Exited. Now building in AI.

description.0: I’ve spent the last decade at the intersection of product, design, and engineering, working across early-stage startups and scaled tech teams.
description.1: In 2021, I co-founded <url1><serif>QED</serif></url1> and grew it from zero to acquisition by <url2><serif>Sandbox</serif></url2>.
description.2: Outside of work, I box. I’m the president of <url3><serif>Viitorul Boxing Club</serif></url3>, where I train and help others do the same. I also <url4><serif>read</serif></url4> a lot, it keeps me sharp.

error404.title: Page Not Found
error404.doesNotExist: The page you are looking for does <serif>not exist</serif>.

bookshelf.title: Bookshelf
bookshelf.personalCollectionOfBooks: This is a personal collection of books I physically own. I'm always happy to exchange books or lend them out, feel free to <serif><url>reach out</url></serif>.

footer.quote: The <serif>starry heavens</serif> above me and <serif>the moral law</serif> within me.
